resources.string: Échec de la connexion. Veuillez réessayer. Si l\'erreur persiste, redémarrez votre application.
Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain at least one uppercase letter, and one digit.
Floor must be an integer between 0 and 20.
Height must be an integer between 1 and 500.
Échec de l\'inscription. Veuillez réessayer. Si l\'erreur persiste, redémarrez votre application.
Incorrect email, an account is already associated with this email
Unable to load information relating to your home. Please log in again. If the error persists, restart your application and check your Internet connection.
Are you sure you want to logout ?
Failed to add the device, please try again. If the problem persists, restart the application and check your Internet connection
Loading the customize calendar failed. If you absolutely want to see it, please restart the application and check the internet connection
Failed to delete the device, please try again. If the problem persists, restart the application and check your Internet connection
Loading the list of habitats to fail. Please try opening the page again. If the problem persists, restart the application and check the internet connection
Error inserting appliance time slot : Please try opening the page again. If the problem persists, restart the application and check the internet connection
Error inserting appliance time slot : You are already using your appliance for this time slot
Erreur du chargement des notifications. Please try opening the page again. If the problem persists, restart the application and check the internet connection

Découvrez notre application de gestion énergétique pour les résidences participatives. Contrôlez votre consommation électrique, gagnez des éco-coins en adoptant des comportements éco-citoyens et contribuez à réduire le pic de consommation de la résidence. Ensemble, agissons pour un avenir plus durable ! \n Conception par Z.Melouk, L.Prigneaux, K.Gack
Aucun compte n\'est associé à cet email
Echec de la connexion au serveur. Veuillez réessayez. Si le problème persiste, redémarrez l\'application et vérifiez votre connexion Internet.
